pages.title: 食用说明
pages.text: 是一个热爱游戏和电影，有时也会去骑骑车的阿宅(x，正在自学C#，Unity和画画，想做一个末日轻科幻风，2.5D，偏探索和剧情向的游戏，主要讲述了一个破灭之战中幸存下来的人类超级士兵和一个失忆的小女孩在终末后的故事。欢迎来我的STEAM主页找我玩！最近在应聘米哈游的实习，希望自己可以被录用(阿巴阿巴) 这是我的一个Hexo博客，模板来自GitHub虽然模板来自GitHub开源项目但是我进行了力所能及的优化 已解决/优化项目 -加入了Aplayer播放器插件并加入了歌词，歌单里是几首自己喜欢的歌 -使用PJAX优化，实现网页预加载，加快读取速度，最重要的是不中断背景图片的播放和Aplayer的播放 -对侧边栏(sidebar)进行了自定义，让其在网页加载完成后直接选中内容并显示下拉菜单(dropdown) -对背景图片(slideshow)的播放进行了自定义，在单张图片上比原来的动画停留时间更加长，但是不影响图片的淡入淡出 -修复了上传至GitHub/Coding后无法显示导航栏图标的问题，原因为font-awesome路径错误 -手机端浏览时背景不全的问题，解决方案来自(https://blog.csdn.net/longchenghui20/article/details/81164030) //发现手机端使用 Chorme 之外的浏览器浏览会导致背景图被压缩的现象，暂无解决方案 -修复了背景图轮播时间轴错误的问题 -修复了在子路径刷新网页Aplayer会出错的问题 待解决/未加入咕咕咕 -[待解决]Aplayer歌曲列表的背景是透明的…. -[未加入]弄一只Live2D看板娘并用PJAX进行优化 更新于2022/7/12 凌晨 PJAX https://github.com/defunkt/jquery-pjaxAplayer https://github.com/MoePlayer/APlayer

posts.title: LNMP环境Minecraft皮肤站搭建过程
posts.text: 先附上皮肤站地址 skin.bluewolf.moe 碎碎念：本次搭建过程中的nginx，php均使用了源码编译安装，中途踩了不少坑orz，下次还是用LNMP一键包吧 环境安装> CentOS 7.9.2009 (至少1G内存，最好再加上一些SWAP用于突发峰值)> 依赖1yum -y install libxml2 libxml2-devel openssl openssl-devel curl-devel libjpeg-devel libpng-devel freetype-devel libmcrypt-devel sqlite-devel epel-release libxml2 libxml2-devel freetype freetype-devel bzip2 bzip2-devel > 安装Mysql 8.0.29123456789# 下载至当前目录/root/wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql80-community-release-el7-6.noarch.rpmyum -y install mysql80-community-release-el7-6.noarch.rpmyum -y install mysql-community-server# 注意，在安装mysql-community-server时可能会由于GPG校验的问题报错GPG key retrieval failed: [Errno 14] curl37，解决方法：编辑mysql-community.repo，将[mysql80-community]下gpgcheck=1改为0即可vim /etc/yum.repos.d/mysql-community.repo# 运行并查看服务状态systemctl start mysqldsystemctl status mysqld 接下来需要连接数据库进行进一步操作，root用户的临时密码可以在日志中查看1grep "password" /var/log/mysqld.log 登录123mysql -u root -p# 输入上一步中获取的临时密码Enter password: 修改密码1ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '你的密码'; 需要遵循默认密码规则，后续可修改 启用root用户远程连接123USE mysql;UPDATE user SET host = '%' WHERE user = 'root';flush privileges; > 安装PHP 7.4.29在安装php前还需要安装pcre2, Libzip, oniguruma和oniguruma-devel(yum源里的可能不够新或者没找到) PCRE2 12345678wget https://github.com/PCRE2Project/pcre2/releases/download/pcre2-10.40/pcre2-10.40.tar.gz# 解压至当前目录/root/tar -xf pcre2-10.40.tar.gzcd pcre2-10.40./configuremake && make install# 创建软链接ln -sv /usr/local/pcre2-10/lib/pkgconfig/* /usr/lib64/pkgconfig/ Libzip在安装Libzip前需要安装CMAKE(预编译时需要用到) 1234567891011121314151617181920212223 # CMAKE cd ~ && wget https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/releases/download/v3.23.2/cmake-3.23.2.tar.gz tar cmake-3.23.2.tar.gz cd cmake-3.23.2 ./configure make && make install # 检测是否安装成功(不行的话试试cmake3 --version) cmake --version # Libzip cd ~ && wget https://libzip.org/download/libzip-1.8.0.tar.gz tar -xf libzip-1.8.0.tar.gz cd libzip-1.8.0 mkdir build && cd build cmake .. make && make install ``` - `Oniguruma和Oniguruma-devel` ``` shell # 省事点直接找了rpm包来安装 cd ~ && wget https://rpmfind.net/linux/epel/7/x86_64/Packages/o/oniguruma-6.8.2-2.el7.x86_64.rpm cd ~ && wget https://rpmfind.net/linux/epel/7/x86_64/Packages/o/oniguruma-devel-6.8.2-2.el7.x86_64.rpm yum -y install oniguruma-6.8.2-2.el7.x86_64.rpm yum -y install oniguruma-devel-6.8.2-2.el7.x86_64.rpm 别忘了在ld.so.conf加入动态库路径 1vim /etc/ld.so.conf 加上这两行(编译安装的libzip和pcre2动态库默认路径在这两个地方) 12/usr/local/lib//usr/local/lib64 下面正式开始安装123456789101112131415cd ~ && wget https://www.php.net/distributions/php-7.4.29.tar.gztar -xf php-7.4.29.tar.gzcd php-7.4.29.tar.gz# 这里自己预编译的时候忘记加上带上zip拓展，后面排查起来浪费了好多时间orz# 默认路径是/usr/local/php./configure --prefix=/usr/local/php --exec-prefix=/usr/local/php --with-mysqli --with-pdo-mysql --enable-gd --with-openssl --enable-mbstring --enable-fpm --enable-bcmath --enable-fpm --with-fpm-user=www --with-fpm-group=www --disable-rpath --with-pic --enable-ftp --with-bz2 --with-jpeg --with-freetype --enable-session --with-webp --with-zipmake && make install# 新建配置文件路径mkdir /usr/local/php/conf# PHP源码包位置cd /root/php-7.4.29# 创建配置文件cp php.ini-production /usr/local/php/conf/php.ini# 创建进程管理脚本，存放在/lib/systemd/systemvim /lib/systemd/system php-fpm.service 写入以下内容12345678910111213[Unit]Description=The PHP FastCGI Process ManagerAfter=syslog.target network.target[Service]Type=forkingPIDFile=/usr/local/php/var/run/php-fpm.pidExecStart=/usr/local/php/sbin/php-fpm --daemonize --fpm-config /usr/local/php/etc/php-fpm.conf --pid /usr/local/php/var/run/php-fpm.pidExecReload=/bin/kill -USR2 $MAINPIDExecStop=/bin/kill -SIGINT $MAINPID[Install]WantedBy=multi-user.target 设置开机启动，启动进程，查看状态123systemctl enable php-fpmsystemctl start php-fpmsystemctl status php-fpm > 安装Nginx 1.22.0在后续配置nginx的时候使用了tls1.3，需要Openssl>=1.1.1，而yum源里最新的也只有1.1.0，所以需要手动编译安装 Openssl 1.1.1o 1234567cd ~ && wget https://www.openssl.org/source/old/1.1.1/openssl-1.1.1o.tar.gztar -xf openssl-1.1.1o.tar.gzcd openssl-1.1.1o# 默认路径是/usr/local/ssl，库文件在/usr/local/lib64# 部分版本可能需要在预编译时加上参数--enable-tls1_3，这里已经默认启用，不需要再加./configuremake && make install 下面开始安装Nginx 12345678cd ~ && wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.22.0.tar.gztar -xf nginx-1.22.0.tar.gz# 由于环境中已经存在Openssl1.1.0，这里需要指定一下Openssl的版本(源码包路径)--with-openssl=/root/openssl-1.1.1o# 默认路径是/usr/local/nginx./configure --user=nginx --group=nginx --with-openssl=/root/openssl-1.1.1o --with-http_v2_module --with-http_ssl_module --with-http_sub_module --with-http_stub_status_module --with-http_gzip_static_module --with-pcremake && make install# 创建进程管理脚本vim /lib/systemd/system/nginx.service 写入以下内容12345678910111213141516[Unit]Description=nginxAfter=network.target remote-fs.target nss-lookup.target[Service]Type=forkingPIDFile=/usr/local/nginx/logs/nginx.pidExecStartPost=/bin/sleep 0.1ExecStartPre=/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx -t -c /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.confExecStart=/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx -c /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.confExecReload=/bin/kill -s HUP $MAINPIDExecStop=/bin/kill -s QUIT $MAINPIDPrivateTmp=true[Install]WantedBy=multi-user.target 设置开机启动，启动进程，查看状态123systemctl enable nginxsystemctl start nginxsystemctl status nginx 至此环境准备部分就做完了 配置> Blessing Skin 5.2.01234# 作者只提供了zipcd ~ && wget https://github.com/bs-community/blessing-skin-server/releases/download/5.2.0/blessing-skin-server-5.2.0.zip# 解压用unzip，使用-d来指定你想要的目录unzip blessing-skin-server-5.2.0 -d /usr/local/nginx/blessing-skin-server-5.2.0 这里需要注意权限的配置否则会报403 Forbidden123# 将网站根目录所有者更改为nginx# chown [-R] 所有者 文件或目录，-R表示连同子目录中的所有文件，都更改所有者chown -R nginx /usr/local/nginx/blessing-skin-server-5.2.0 > 配置证书相关这里使用Let’s Encrypt和acme.sh脚本来签发https证书参考https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E123456# 安装脚本，把邮箱替换成你的，签发时需要用到curl https://get.acme.sh | sh -s email=1263635137@qq.com# 给脚本设置别名方便使用alias acme.sh=~/.acme.sh/acme.sh# 指定域名，指定网站目录，签发证书acme.sh --issue -d skin.bluewolf.moe --webroot /usr/local/nginx/blessing-skin-server-5.2.0 证书签发后会在 60 天以后会自动更新, 无需任何操作，接下来还需要安装证书12# 将证书存放在/usr/local/nginx/ssl/skin.bluewolf.moeacme.sh --install-cert -d skin.bluewolf.moe --key-file /usr/local/nginx/ssl/skin.bluewolf.moe/key.pem --fullchain-file /usr/local/nginx/ssl/skin.bluewolf.moe/cert.pem > 配置Nginx默认配置文件位于/usr/local/nginx/conf1234# 新建一个目录用于存放站点配置文件mkdir /usr/local/nginx/conf/conf.d# 新建站点配置skin.confvim /usr/local/nginx/conf/conf.d/skin.conf 插入以下内容12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940server { listen 443 ssl; server_name skin.bluewolf.moe; root /usr/local/nginx/blessing-skin-server-5.2.0/public; index index.php index.html index.htm; # 解决jsdelivr在国内被污染的问题 sub_filter 'cdn.jsdelivr.net' 'fastly.jsdelivr.net'; sub_filter_once off; sub_filter_types *; # 证书和tls相关 ssl_certificate /usr/local/nginx/ssl/skin.bluewolf.moe/cert.pem; ssl_certificate_key /usr/local/nginx/ssl/skin.bluewolf.moe/key.pem; ssl_protocols TLSv1.3; ssl_ciphers TLS13-AES-256-GCM-SHA384:TLS13-CHACHA20-POLY1305-SHA256:TLS13-AES-128-GCM-SHA256:TLS13-AES-128-CCM-8-SHA256:TLS13-AES-128-CCM-SHA256:EECDH+CHACHA20:EECDH+CHACHA20-draft:EECDH+ECDSA+AES128:EECDH+aRSA+AES128:RSA+AES128:EECDH+ECDSA+AES256:EECDH+aRSA+AES256:RSA+AES256:EECDH+ECDSA+3DES:EECDH+aRSA+3DES:RSA+3DES:!MD5; ssl_early_data on; ssl_stapling on; ssl_stapling_verify on; add_header Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000"; proxy_set_header Early-Data $ssl_early_data; # 皮肤站相关，参考https://blessing.netlify.app/setup.html location / { try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$query_string; } # php相关，参考https://blog.csdn.net/Mjklioptop/article/details/123962639 location ~ \.php$ { fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000; fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME /usr/local/nginx/blessing-skin-server-5.2.0/public$fastcgi_script_name; include fastcgi_params; }}server { listen 80; server_name skin.bluewolf.moe; return 301 https://skin.bluewolf.moe$request_uri;} 上述配置文件中已配置证书，域名，强制https并使用tls1.3，由于近期jsdelivr在国内被和谐还需要使用sub_filter做一个替换将cdn.jsdelivr.net全部替换成fastly.jsdelivr.net参考https://github.com/jsdelivr/jsdelivr/issues/183972022-7-15更新：原域名已恢复访问，实际环境中不再使用fastly.jsdelivr.net 接下来还需要在nginx.conf中应用站点配置，顺便对nginx进行一些设置123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118# 在末尾加入include conf.d/*.conf;user nginx;worker_processes 1;error_log logs/error.log error;#error_log logs/error.log notice;#error_log logs/error.log info;#pid logs/nginx.pid;events { worker_connections 1024;}http { include mime.types; default_type application/octet-stream; #log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" ' # '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" ' # '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"'; #access_log logs/access.log main; sendfile on; #tcp_nopush on; #keepalive_timeout 0; keepalive_timeout 65; gzip on; server { listen 80; server_name localhost; #charset koi8-r; #access_log logs/host.access.log main; location / { root html; index index.html index.htm; } error_page 404 /404.html; # redirect server error pages to the static page /50x.html # error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; location = /50x.html { root html; } # proxy the PHP scripts to Apache listening on 127.0.0.1:80 # #location ~ \.php$ { # proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1; #} # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on 127.0.0.1:9000 location ~ \.php$ { root html; fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000; fastcgi_index index.php; fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name; include fastcgi_params; } # deny access to .htaccess files, if Apache's document root # concurs with nginx's one # #location ~ /\.ht { # deny all; #} } # another virtual host using mix of IP-, name-, and port-based configuration # #server { # listen 8000; # listen somename:8080; # server_name somename alias another.alias; # location / { # root html; # index index.html index.htm; # } #} # HTTPS server # #server { # listen 443 ssl; # server_name localhost; # ssl_certificate cert.pem; # ssl_certificate_key cert.key; # ssl_session_cache shared:SSL:1m; # ssl_session_timeout 5m; # ssl_ciphers HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5; # ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on; # location / { # root html; # index index.html index.htm; # } #}include conf.d/*.conf;} 完成！现在，访问你的站点域名，按照引导进行站点配置即可，如果出现问题，可以按照官方的安装指南进行排查

posts.title: ttt动态karma插件
posts.text: 为了解决TTT中部分恶意玩家随意杀人的现象而制作 (karma过低要被ban了就退，过段时间继续)新的karma系统引入了kd值这一概念，即kd值=正确击杀/错误击杀，根据这个值来计算karma上限(大于或小于1000)，同时也会影响玩家可以造成的伤害，并且将数据储存在服务器中，玩家进入服务器后就会生效，进一步完善了原版karma系统 全部源文件https://pan.baidu.com/s/1eQgXnC2VZsDk-Yr4X6UB1Q 提取码mf51 核心部分代码---- 动态karma系统KARMA = {}-- ply steamid -> karma 记录玩家数据KARMA.RememberedPlayers = {}KARMA.cv = {}KARMA.cv.enabled = CreateConVar("ttt_karma", "1", FCVAR_ARCHIVE)KARMA.cv.strict = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_strict", "1")KARMA.cv.starting = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_starting", "1000")KARMA.cv.max = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_max", "1000")KARMA.cv.ratio = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_ratio", "0.001")KARMA.cv.killpenalty = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_kill_penalty", "15")KARMA.cv.roundheal = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_round_increment", "5")KARMA.cv.clean = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_clean_bonus", "30")KARMA.cv.tbonus = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_traitorkill_bonus", "40")KARMA.cv.tratio = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_traitordmg_ratio", "0.0003")KARMA.cv.debug = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_debugspam", "0")KARMA.cv.persist = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_persist", "0")KARMA.cv.falloff = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_clean_half", "0.25")KARMA.cv.autokick = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_low_autokick", "1")KARMA.cv.kicklevel = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_low_amount", "450")KARMA.cv.autoban = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_low_ban", "1")KARMA.cv.bantime = CreateConVar("ttt_karma_low_ban_minutes", "60")local config = KARMA.cvlocal function IsDebug() return config.debug:GetBool() endlocal math = mathcvars.AddChangeCallback("ttt_karma_max", function(cvar, old, new) SetGlobalInt("ttt_karma_max", new)end)function KARMA.InitState() SetGlobalBool("ttt_karma", config.enabled:GetBool()) SetGlobalInt("ttt_karma_max", config.max:GetFloat())endfunction KARMA.IsEnabled() return GetGlobalBool("ttt_karma", false)end-- 计算当前伤害惩罚function KARMA.GetHurtPenalty(victim_karma, dmg) return victim_karma * math.Clamp(dmg * config.ratio:GetFloat(), 0, 1)end-- 计算当前击杀惩罚function KARMA.GetKillPenalty(victim_karma) return KARMA.GetHurtPenalty(victim_karma, config.killpenalty:GetFloat())end-- 计算当前击杀奖励function KARMA.GetHurtReward(dmg) return config.max:GetFloat() * math.Clamp(dmg * config.tratio:GetFloat(), 0, 1)endfunction KARMA.GetKillReward() return KARMA.GetHurtReward(config.tbonus:GetFloat())endfunction KARMA.GivePenalty(ply, penalty, victim) if not hook.Call( "TTTKarmaGivePenalty", nil, ply, penalty, victim ) then ply:SetLiveKarma(math.max(ply:GetLiveKarma() - penalty, 0)) endendfunction KARMA.GiveReward(ply, reward) reward = KARMA.DecayedMultiplier(ply) * reward -- local maxkarma = config.max:GetFloat() if ( ply:TTTKarma_GetTOTALKills() > 30 ) then maxkarma = maxkarma + ( maxkarma * ( ply:TTTKarma_GetRATIOKills() - 2 ) ) maxkarma = math.min( maxkarma, 1200 ) maxkarma = math.max( maxkarma, 800 ) end -- ply:SetLiveKarma(math.min(ply:GetLiveKarma() + reward, maxkarma)) return rewardendfunction KARMA.ApplyKarma(ply) local df = 1 -- 当karma小于1000时，计算惩罚曲线 if ply:GetBaseKarma() < 1000 then local k = ply:GetBaseKarma() - 1000 if config.strict:GetBool() then df = 1 + (0.0007 * k) + (-0.000002 * (k^2)) else df = 1 + -0.0000025 * (k^2) end end ply:SetDamageFactor(math.Clamp(df, 0.1, 1.0)) if IsDebug() then print(Format("%s has karma %f and gets df %f", ply:Nick(), ply:GetBaseKarma(), df)) endend-- 当T免伤时返回truelocal function WasAvoidable(attacker, victim, dmginfo) local infl = dmginfo:GetInflictor() if attacker:IsTraitor() and victim:IsTraitor() and IsValid(infl) and infl.Avoidable then return true end return falseend-- 处理对其他玩家造成伤害时的karma变化(此时伤害还未生效)function KARMA.Hurt(attacker, victim, dmginfo) if not IsValid(attacker) or not IsValid(victim) then return end if attacker == victim then return end if not attacker:IsPlayer() or not victim:IsPlayer() then return end -- 伤害大于玩家当前生命值的部分不会被处理 local hurt_amount = math.min(victim:Health(), dmginfo:GetDamage()) if attacker:GetTraitor() == victim:GetTraitor() then if WasAvoidable(attacker, victim, dmginfo) then return end local penalty = KARMA.GetHurtPenalty(victim:GetLiveKarma(), hurt_amount) KARMA.GivePenalty(attacker, penalty, victim) attacker:SetCleanRound(false) if IsDebug() then print(Format("%s (%f) attacked %s (%f) for %d and got penalised for %f", attacker:Nick(), attacker:GetLiveKarma(), victim:Nick(), victim:GetLiveKarma(), hurt_amount, penalty)) end elseif (not attacker:GetTraitor()) and victim:GetTraitor() then local reward = KARMA.GetHurtReward(hurt_amount) reward = KARMA.GiveReward(attacker, reward) if IsDebug() then print(Format("%s (%f) attacked %s (%f) for %d and got REWARDED %f", attacker:Nick(), attacker:GetLiveKarma(), victim:Nick(), victim:GetLiveKarma(), hurt_amount, reward)) end endend-- 处理击杀其他玩家时的karma变化function KARMA.Killed(attacker, victim, dmginfo) if not IsValid(attacker) or not IsValid(victim) then return end if attacker == victim then return end if not attacker:IsPlayer() or not victim:IsPlayer() then return end if attacker:GetTraitor() == victim:GetTraitor() then if WasAvoidable(attacker, victim, dmginfo) then return end local penalty = KARMA.GetKillPenalty(victim:GetLiveKarma()) KARMA.GivePenalty(attacker, penalty, victim) attacker:SetCleanRound(false) if IsDebug() then print(Format("%s (%f) killed %s (%f) and gets penalised for %f", attacker:Nick(), attacker:GetLiveKarma(), victim:Nick(), victim:GetLiveKarma(), penalty)) end elseif (not attacker:GetTraitor()) and victim:GetTraitor() then local reward = KARMA.GetKillReward() reward = KARMA.GiveReward(attacker, reward) if IsDebug() then print(Format("%s (%f) killed %s (%f) and gets REWARDED %f", attacker:Nick(), attacker:GetLiveKarma(), victim:Nick(), victim:GetLiveKarma(), reward)) end endend-- 以指数方式衰减，当玩家的额外karma为(basediff * half)时，karma奖励是原始值的一半local expdecay = math.ExponentialDecayfunction KARMA.DecayedMultiplier(ply) local max = config.max:GetFloat() local start = config.starting:GetFloat() local k = ply:GetLiveKarma() if config.falloff:GetFloat() <= 0 or k < start then return 1 elseif k < max then local basediff = max - start local plydiff = k - start local half = math.Clamp(config.falloff:GetFloat(), 0.01, 0.99) return expdecay(basediff * half, plydiff) end return 1end-- 在回合开始时处理karma变化function KARMA.RoundIncrement() local healbonus = config.roundheal:GetFloat() local cleanbonus = config.clean:GetFloat() for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do if ply:IsDeadTerror() and ply.death_type ~= KILL_SUICIDE or not ply:IsSpec() then local bonus = healbonus + (ply:GetCleanRound() and cleanbonus or 0) KARMA.GiveReward(ply, bonus) if IsDebug() then print(ply, "gets roundincr", incr) end end endend-- 将当前karma值设置为基础值function KARMA.Rebase() for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do if IsDebug() then print(ply, "rebased from", ply:GetBaseKarma(), "to", ply:GetLiveKarma()) end ply:SetBaseKarma(ply:GetLiveKarma()) endendfunction KARMA.ApplyKarmaAll() for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do KARMA.ApplyKarma(ply) endend-- 应用伤害奖惩function KARMA.NotifyPlayer(ply) local df = ply:GetDamageFactor() or 1 local k = math.Round(ply:GetBaseKarma()) if df > 0.99 then LANG.Msg(ply, "karma_dmg_full", {amount = k}) else LANG.Msg(ply, "karma_dmg_other", {amount = k, num = math.ceil((1 - df) * 100)}) endendfunction KARMA.RoundEnd() if KARMA.IsEnabled() then KARMA.RoundIncrement() KARMA.Rebase() KARMA.RememberAll() if config.autokick:GetBool() then for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do KARMA.CheckAutoKick(ply) end end endendfunction KARMA.RoundBegin() KARMA.InitState() if KARMA.IsEnabled() then for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do KARMA.ApplyKarma(ply) KARMA.NotifyPlayer(ply) end endendfunction KARMA.InitPlayer(ply) local k = KARMA.Recall(ply) or config.starting:GetFloat() k = math.Clamp(k, 0, config.max:GetFloat()) ply:SetBaseKarma(k) ply:SetLiveKarma(k) ply:SetCleanRound(true) ply:SetDamageFactor(1.0) -- 此处karma可能与实际情况不同，需要重新 KARMA.ApplyKarma(ply)endfunction KARMA.Remember(ply) if ply.karma_kicked or (not ply:IsFullyAuthenticated()) then return end -- 存储方式 if config.persist:GetBool() then ply:SetPData("karma_stored", ply:GetLiveKarma()) end -- (备用)txt文本记录方式 KARMA.RememberedPlayers[ply:SteamID()] = ply:GetLiveKarma()endfunction KARMA.Recall(ply) if config.persist:GetBool()then ply.delay_karma_recall = not ply:IsFullyAuthenticated() if ply:IsFullyAuthenticated() then local k = tonumber(ply:GetPData("karma_stored", nil)) if k then return k end end end return KARMA.RememberedPlayers[ply:SteamID()]endfunction KARMA.LateRecallAndSet(ply) local k = tonumber(ply:GetPData("karma_stored", KARMA.RememberedPlayers[ply:SteamID()])) if k and k < ply:GetLiveKarma() then ply:SetBaseKarma(k) ply:SetLiveKarma(k) endendfunction KARMA.RememberAll() for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do KARMA.Remember(ply) endend-- 将karma过低玩家自动封禁/T出local reason = "Karma too low"function KARMA.CheckAutoKick(ply) if ply:GetBaseKarma() <= config.kicklevel:GetInt() then if hook.Call("TTTKarmaLow", GAMEMODE, ply) == false then return end ServerLog(ply:Nick() .. " autokicked/banned for low karma.\n") ply.karma_kicked = true if config.persist:GetBool() then local k = math.Clamp(config.starting:GetFloat() * 0.8, config.kicklevel:GetFloat() * 1.1, config.max:GetFloat()) ply:SetPData("karma_stored", k) KARMA.RememberedPlayers[ply:SteamID()] = k end if config.autoban:GetBool() then ply:KickBan(config.bantime:GetInt(), reason) else ply:Kick(reason) end endendfunction KARMA.PrintAll(printfn) for _, ply in pairs(player.GetAll()) do printfn(Format("%s : Live = %f -- Base = %f -- Dmg = %f\n", ply:Nick(), ply:GetLiveKarma(), ply:GetBaseKarma(), ply:GetDamageFactor() * 100)) endend

posts.title: 关于gmod zs医疗包重置冷却时间的bug
posts.text: 最近在服务器里发现有玩家可以无视医疗包冷却时间，做到快速治疗，遂在本地进行了测试 复现方法 打开控制台，输入bind q “zsdropammo”, bind g “zs_pointsshopbuy battery” 购买一个医疗包，通过正常方式使用掉医疗包里自带的30点能量(这里的30点能量判定为弹匣，无法通过指令zsdropammo掉落) 医疗包能量为0后，购买一份医疗能量(这里的医疗能量会被判定为备弹，可以通过指令zsdropammo掉落) 正常使用医疗包，此时冷却时间正常 (重点)马上按下G(此前绑定了指令zsdropammo)，此时医疗能量会被清空并形成掉落物 再次使用医疗包，此时冷却时间会被大大缩短 按下G购买医疗能量(此前绑定了指令zs_pointsshopbuy battery) 从步骤3开始循环操作，制作为鼠标宏方便使用，即可实现快速治疗的效果 解决方法一开始想过直接给zs_pointsshopbuy设置为管理员指令，这样普通玩家就无法使用了，但正常游戏中许多地方都需要调用这个指令，改动起来太过麻烦最终选择了修改医疗包的lua来解决，\zombiesurvival\entities\weapons\weapon_zs_medicalkit.lua第167行 1234567891011121314function SWEP:CanPrimaryAttack() local owner = self:GetOwner() if owner:IsHolding() or owner:GetBarricadeGhosting() then return false end if self:GetPrimaryAmmoCount() <= 0 then self:EmitSound("items/medshotno1.wav") -- 修复医疗能量为0时进行治疗可以大幅缩短冷却时间的BUG，原版为0.75 self:SetNextCharge(CurTime() + self.Primary.Delay) owner.NextMedKitUse = self:GetNextCharge() return false end return self:GetNextCharge() <= CurTime() and (owner.NextMedKitUse or 0) <= CurTime()end 完美解决

posts.title: 苍狼の盘个人网盘开通
posts.text: 一直想找一个好用的网盘，汇总了一下国内各大网盘，评测均为不开会员/购买套餐的情况下（留下了贫穷的泪水） 百度云     限速（废话），虽然能用第三方下载软件达到加速效果，但是会被查到并限速 微云       限速，腾讯的网盘，开了SVIP就不限速（充钱才能使你变的更强） 360云盘    收费，之前还挺好用的，然后就凉了，数据也没了，活过来后要收钱了 蓝奏云     不限速，但是每个文件限制100MB，并且限制文件格式 坚果云     不限速，但是每个月只有1G的上传流量，3G的下载流量 我的文档云 基本不限速，而且空间不限量！实测下载2.5M/S，基本够用，安利一波 不过最后单独安利一个冷门网盘呆萌网盘，仿windows界面，还有很多细节也很好，但是注册需要答题，容量在2TB左右，限速1M/S左右，已经快要凉了 最后找了Oneindex+Onedrive来实现不限速下载，onedrive最好使用教育版账号，有5T容量，不过Onedrive在国内好像被墙了….. 教育邮箱申请 具体教程(https://blog.csdn.net/yyp12321/article/details/82993191)首先你需要有一个教育邮箱（国内外各大高校）这里使用了City Colleges of Chicago的邮箱，到CCC的官网提交一张申请表格，期间需要用到的美国人信息从这里生成，填邮箱的时候填gmail邮箱，等待审核通过后会收到一份包含邮箱信息的邮件，根据邮件步骤，修改密码，完成问卷，就可以了 Onedrive教育版申请 前往office365教育版官网(https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/education/products/office/default.aspx)之后填入申请的教育邮箱，点击免费获取office，选择我是一个学生出现以下提示说明获取成功，按提示登录即可 之后用这个账户登录Onedrive就是教育版了 OneIndex搭建 OneIndex是一个目录列表程序，可以将OneDrive网盘里面的文件列出来供我们查看/下载，而且并不会消耗服务器的流量和空间 #以下为大致功能缩略图功能命令行上传功能响应式，支持小屏设备图片、视频、音频在线预览代码在线查看（js、css、html、sh、php、java、md等）README.md支持，解析各目录下(onedirive目录下)README.md文件，在页面尾部展示。HEAD.md支持，在页面头部展示.password文件夹加密在线视频播放器替换成Dplayer在线视频播放支持mp4、webm,avi、mpg、mpeg、rm、rmvb、mov、wmv、mkv、asf。cli文件夹上传（单线程）不同后缀展示设置文件直接输出文件上传管理（后台）图床功能 我用的是Vultr的主机，国内阿里云，腾讯云都需要备案，嫌麻烦…搭建的时候系统选择CentOS7，等待搭建的时候可以先配置一下防火墙规则，选择Firewall进入 点击Add Firewall Group创建一组规则，随后在Action下面点击+号新增规则 新增规则如下图所示 之后使用宝塔安装LNMP环境PHP版本需要5.6+，打开curl支持完成后从GitHub下载项目，挂载，绑定域名即可 配置 结束 最后附上自己的网盘地址 苍狼の盘 http://pan.bluewolf.blog

posts.text: http://music.163.com/song/media/outer/url?id=歌曲ID.mp3 其中歌曲ID请自行获取~ 歌曲ID的获取方法进入网页版的网易云，选中播放的歌曲，进入播放的详情页 此时地址栏的链接里就有歌曲ID，如图所示 红框标识处即为歌曲ID 转载自@不完全甜解析
